title: Briefing for health
brief_description: Indicates the dangers facing the female recruit when she joins the W.A.A.F. The ravages of venereal diseases are illustrated, with information on the avoidance of the disease and on measures to be taken if it is suspected that the disease has been contacted. No other credits available.
